text: The Memreşo ambush in 2022 refers to an attack by the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) against the Turkish armed forces in northern Iraq, as part of Operation Claw-Lock. This operation, launched by Turkey in April 2022, aimed to neutralize the positions of the PKK in the mountainous regions of Metina, Zap and Avashin Basyan, located in the governorate of Dahuk, Iraqi Kurdistan. ==See also== • Operation Claw-Lock • Operation Northern Iraq (2023) • Attack of Xakurk and Zap (2023) ==References== Category:Battles involving Turkey
title: Mamreso ambush 2022
